TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Provincial Deputation, 05-25-1824

barker_notes.barker_summary: Acknowledging election of deputy to State congress.
barker_notes.barker_footnotes: This and the three letters to the provincial deputation which follow are from the Nacogdoches Archives. Translations from Bexar Archives, Texas State Library.

div1.p: Acknowledging election of deputy to State congress.
Stephen F. Austin, To the Most Excellent Deputation of the Province of Texas.

I am apprized of the election, for Representative in the Constitutive Legislature of the State, of the Baron de Bastrop, and for substitute, Lieutenant Colonel and Sub Deacon Don Juan Manuel Sambrano, which news I will communicate to the inhabitants of this District
God and Liberty, Town of San Felipe de Austin, May 25th 1824. 4-3.
